title: Charleston
description: Plain weave silk cloth with alternating 1/2\" and 1 1/4\" pale yellow stripes of puckered warp in between vertical pale orange stripes and thin green lines. Plain weave silk cloth with alternating pale yellow 1/2\" and blue 1 1/4\" stripes of puckered warp in between vertical yellow and light blue stripes and thin grey lines. Larkspur
